title: what's this font? I have seen it lots before, but cant remember the name......
content:
I need to find out what font is used in the text “It’s About Living”  
don’t let the stitched look fool you.  
Ive tried to use whatthefont and identifont with no results because it has been digitized for embroidery...

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081012143710im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/advantage_4910.jpg)

 [‹ Sans-Serif character set serious help needed!!](http://web.archive.org/web/20081012143710/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45142 "Go to previous forum topic") [Hancock (the movie) ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081012143710/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45130 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Jack Clements
